com.hazelcast.spi.impl

Interface PacketHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    InternalEventService, OperationExecutor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsyncInboundResponseHandler, EventServiceImpl, InboundResponseHandler, InvocationMonitor, OperationExecutorImpl, PacketDispatcher, TcpIpConnectionManager

    public interface PacketHandler
    The PacketHandler is responsible for handling packets. It provides an abstraction for different components that want to receive packets and handle them. For example an OperationService that receive operation or operation-response packets.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handle(Packet packet)
      Signals the PacketHandler that there is a packet to be handled.

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        void handle(Packet packet)
     throws Exception
        Signals the PacketHandler that there is a packet to be handled.
        Parameters:
        packet - the response packet to handle
        Throws:
        Exception
